mocafe.fenut.solvers¶

class mocafe.fenut.solvers.PETScNewtonSolver(solver_parameters: dict, comm=<mpi4py.MPI.Intracomm object>)¶

INTERNAL USE

Defines a solver for a nonlinear problem directly calling the PETSc linear algebra backend.

solver_setup(self: dolfin.cpp.nls.NewtonSolver, arg0: dolfin.cpp.la.GenericMatrix, arg1: dolfin.cpp.la.GenericMatrix, arg2: dolfin::NonlinearProblem, arg3: int) → None¶
class mocafe.fenut.solvers.PETScProblem(J, F, bcs)¶

INTERNAL USE

Defines a nonlinear problem directly calling the PETSc linear algebra backend. This is the preferred way of defining a problem.

F(self: dolfin.cpp.nls.NonlinearProblem, arg0: dolfin.cpp.la.GenericVector, arg1: dolfin.cpp.la.GenericVector) → None¶
J(self: dolfin.cpp.nls.NonlinearProblem, arg0: dolfin.cpp.la.GenericMatrix, arg1: dolfin.cpp.la.GenericVector) → None¶
